ghostPage.title: NCRYPTO Public GPG Keys
ghostPage.excerpt:
Please use this key for sending us anonymous tips and news information. For full
instructions on how to use one, refer to this article here.

Public key for first@ncrypto.co
For ED25519 ECC algorithm, use this key

authors.name: NCRYPTO Labs
authors.bio: Our news is trusted and free for everyone. We do not charge you for it, not even your data.

primary_author.name: NCRYPTO Labs
primary_author.bio: Our news is trusted and free for everyone. We do not charge you for it, not even your data.
